verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> [T'al-upon שׁוֹשַׁנִּ֬ים <S%H7799><s%> sho-shan-Nim upon Shoshannim לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> le-da-Vid. [A Psalm] of David הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי <S%H3467><s%> ho-shi-'E-ni Save אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; me O God כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בָ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> Va-'u are come מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim for the waters עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <S%H5315><s%> Na-fesh. in unto [my] soul

טָבַ֤עְתִּי׀ <S%H2883><s%> ta-Va'-ti I sink בִּיוֵ֣ן <S%H3121><s%> bi-Ven mire מְ֭צוּלָה <S%H4688><s%> Me-tzu-lah in deep וְאֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> ve-'Ein and there מָעֳמָ֑ד <S%H4613><s%> mo-'o-Mad; where [there is] no standing בָּ֥אתִי <S%H935><s%> Ba-ti I am come בְמַעֲמַקֵּי־ <S%H4615><s%> ve-ma-'a-mak-kei- into deep מַ֝֗יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim, waters וְשִׁבֹּ֥לֶת <S%H7641><s%> ve-shib-Bo-let where the floods שְׁטָפָֽתְנִי׃ <S%H7857><s%> she-ta-Fa-te-ni. overflow

יָגַ֣עְתִּי <S%H3021><s%> ya-Ga'-ti I am weary בְקָרְאִי֮ <S%H7121><s%> ve-ka-re-'I of my crying נִחַ֪ר <S%H2787><s%> ni-Char is dried גְּר֫וֹנִ֥י <S%H1627><s%> ge-Ro-Ni my throat כָּל֥וּ <S%H3615><s%> ka-Lu fail עֵינַ֑י <S%H5869><s%> 'ei-Nai; mine eyes מְ֝יַחֵ֗ל <S%H3176><s%> me-ya-Chel, while I wait לֵאלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> le-lo-Hai. for my God

רַבּ֤וּ׀ <S%H7231><s%> rab-Bu are more מִשַּׂעֲר֣וֹת <S%H8185><s%> mis-sa-'a-Rot than the hairs רֹאשִׁי֮ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Shi of mine head שֹׂנְאַ֪י <S%H8130><s%> so-ne-'Ai They that hate חִ֫נָּ֥ם <S%H2600><s%> chin-Nam me without a cause עָצְמ֣וּ <S%H6105><s%> 'a-tze-Mu are mighty מַ֭צְמִיתַי <S%H6789><s%> Matz-mi-tai they that would destroy אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vai me [being] mine enemies שֶׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> She-ker; wrongfully אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher What לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- did not גָ֝זַ֗לְתִּי <S%H1497><s%> ga-Zal-ti, [that] which I took not away אָ֣ז <S%H227><s%> 'az then אָשִֽׁיב׃ <S%H7725><s%> 'a-Shiv. then I restored

אֱ‍ ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> 'elo-Him, O God אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah who יָ֭דַעְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> Ya-da'-ta thou knowest לְאִוַּלְתִּ֑י <S%H200><s%> le-'iv-val-Ti; my foolishness וְ֝אַשְׁמוֹתַ֗י <S%H819><s%> ve-'ash-mo-Tai, and my sins מִמְּךָ֥ <S%H4480><s%> mi-me-Cha at לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- are not נִכְחָֽדוּ׃ <S%H3582><s%> nich-Cha-du. are not hid

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> ye-Vo-shu be ashamed בִ֨י׀ vi קֹוֶיךָ֮ <S%H6960><s%> koei-Cha Let not them that wait אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> 'a-do-Nai on thee O Lord יְהוִ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh GOD צְבָ֫א֥וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va-'ot of hosts אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- nay יִכָּ֣לְמוּ <S%H3637><s%> yik-Kal-mu thee be confounded בִ֣י vi מְבַקְשֶׁ֑יךָ <S%H1245><s%> me-vak-Shei-cha; for my sake let not those that seek אֱ֝לֹהֵ֗י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei, for my sake O God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- Because עָ֭לֶיךָ <S%H5921><s%> 'A-lei-cha your sake נָשָׂ֣אתִי <S%H5375><s%> na-Sa-ti Because for thy sake I have borne חֶרְפָּ֑ה <S%H2781><s%> cher-Pah; reproach כִּסְּתָ֖ה <S%H3680><s%> kis-se-Tah hath covered כְלִמָּ֣ה <S%H3639><s%> che-lim-Mah shame פָנָֽי׃ <S%H6440><s%> fa-Nai. my face

מ֭וּזָר <S%H2114><s%> Mu-zor I am become a stranger הָיִ֣יתִי <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yi-ti have לְאֶחָ֑י <S%H251><s%> le-'e-Chai; unto my brethren וְ֝נָכְרִ֗י <S%H5237><s%> ve-na-che-Ri, and an alien לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei children אִמִּֽי׃ <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mi. unto my mother's

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- For קִנְאַ֣ת <S%H7068><s%> kin-'At For the zeal בֵּיתְךָ֣ <S%H1004><s%> bei-te-Cha of thine house אֲכָלָ֑תְנִי <S%H398><s%> 'a-cha-La-te-ni; hath eaten me up וְחֶרְפּ֥וֹת <S%H2781><s%> ve-cher-Pot and the reproaches ח֝וֹרְפֶ֗יךָ <S%H2778><s%> chor-Fei-cha, of them that reproached נָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> na-fe-Lu thee are fallen עָלָֽי׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai. and

וָאֶבְכֶּ֣ה <S%H1058><s%> va-'ev-Keh When I wept בַצּ֣וֹם <S%H6685><s%> vatz-Tzom with fasting נַפְשִׁ֑י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi; [and chastened] my soul וַתְּהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi became לַחֲרָפ֣וֹת <S%H2781><s%> la-cha-ra-Fot that was to my reproach לִֽי׃ Li.

וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> va-'et-te-Nah I made לְבוּשִׁ֣י <S%H3830><s%> le-vu-Shi also my garment שָׂ֑ק <S%H8242><s%> Sak; sackcloth וָאֱהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> va-'e-Hi became לָהֶ֣ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like לְמָשָֽׁל׃ <S%H4912><s%> le-ma-Shal. and I became a proverb

יָשִׂ֣יחוּ <S%H7878><s%> ya-Si-chu speak בִ֭י vi יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <S%H3427><s%> Yo-she-vei They that sit in שָׁ֑עַר <S%H8179><s%> Sha-'ar; the gate וּ֝נְגִינ֗וֹת <S%H5058><s%> u-ne-gi-Not, against me and I [was] the song שׁוֹתֵ֥י <S%H8354><s%> sho-Tei assuredly שֵׁכָֽר׃ <S%H7941><s%> she-Char. strong drink

וַאֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni Me תְפִלָּתִֽי־ <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-ti- But as for me my prayer לְךָ֨׀ le-Cha יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh [is] unto thee O LORD עֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> 'et time רָצ֗וֹן <S%H7522><s%> ra-Tzon, [in] an acceptable אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God בְּרָב־ <S%H7230><s%> be-rov- in the multitude חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha; of thy mercy עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Ne-ni, hear בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <S%H571><s%> be-'e-Met me in the truth יִשְׁעֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3468><s%> yish-'E-cha. of thy salvation

הַצִּילֵ֣נִי <S%H5337><s%> hatz-tzi-Le-ni Deliver מִ֭טִּיט <S%H2916><s%> Mit-tit me out of the mire וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not אֶטְבָּ֑עָה <S%H2883><s%> 'et-Ba-'ah; and let me not sink אִנָּצְלָ֥ה <S%H5337><s%> 'in-na-tze-Lah let me be delivered מִ֝שֹּֽׂנְאַ֗י <S%H8130><s%> mis-so-ne-'Ai, from them that hate וּמִמַּֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <S%H4615><s%> u-mi-ma-'a-mak-kei- me and out of the deep מָֽיִם׃ <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim. waters

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- Nor תִּשְׁטְפֵ֤נִי׀ <S%H7857><s%> tish-te-Fe-ni overflow שִׁבֹּ֣לֶת <S%H7641><s%> shib-Bo-let branch מַ֭יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim of water וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- Nor תִּבְלָעֵ֣נִי <S%H1104><s%> tiv-la-'E-ni swallow me up מְצוּלָ֑ה <S%H4688><s%> me-tzu-Lah; me neither let the deep וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- Nor תֶּאְטַר־ <S%H332><s%> te'-tar- shut עָלַ֖י <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lai and בְּאֵ֣ר <S%H875><s%> be-'Er and let not the pit פִּֽיהָ׃ <S%H6310><s%> Pi-ha. her mouth

עֲנֵ֣נִי <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Ne-ni Hear יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh me O LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for ט֣וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov [is] good חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> chas-De-cha; for thy lovingkindness כְּרֹ֥ב <S%H7230><s%> ke-Ro unto me according to the multitude רַ֝חֲמֶ֗יךָ <S%H7356><s%> ra-cha-Mei-cha, of thy tender mercies פְּנֵ֣ה <S%H6437><s%> pe-Neh turn אֵלָֽי׃ <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai. and do

וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not תַּסְתֵּ֣ר <S%H5641><s%> tas-Ter And hide פָּ֭נֶיךָ <S%H6440><s%> Pa-nei-cha not thy face מֵֽעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5650><s%> me-'av-De-cha; from thy servant כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- I am in צַר־ <S%H6887><s%> tzar- for I am in trouble לִ֝֗י Li, מַהֵ֥ר <S%H4118><s%> ma-Her me speedily עֲנֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6030><s%> 'a-Ne-ni. hear

קָרְבָ֣ה <S%H7126><s%> ka-re-Vah Draw nigh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to נַפְשִׁ֣י <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi unto my soul גְאָלָ֑הּ <S%H1350><s%> ge-'a-Lah; [and] redeem לְמַ֖עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an because אֹיְבַ֣י <S%H341><s%> 'o-ye-Vai me because of mine enemies פְּדֵֽנִי׃ <S%H6299><s%> pe-De-ni. it deliver

אַתָּ֤ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah You יָדַ֗עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta, Thou hast known חֶרְפָּתִ֣י <S%H2781><s%> cher-pa-Ti my reproach וּ֭בָשְׁתִּי <S%H1322><s%> U-va-she-ti and my shame וּכְלִמָּתִ֑י <S%H3639><s%> u-che-lim-ma-Ti; and my dishonour נֶ֝גְדְּךָ֗ <S%H5048><s%> neg-de-cha, are before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- All צוֹרְרָֽי׃ <S%H6887><s%> tzor-Rai. mine adversaries

חֶרְפָּ֤ה׀ <S%H2781><s%> cher-Pah Reproach שָֽׁבְרָ֥ה <S%H7665><s%> sha-ve-Rah hath broken לִבִּ֗י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi, my heart וָֽאָ֫נ֥וּשָׁה <S%H5136><s%> va-'A-Nu-shah and I am full of heaviness וָאֲקַוֶּ֣ה <S%H6960><s%> va-'a-kav-Veh and I looked לָנ֣וּד <S%H5110><s%> la-Nud [for some] to take pity וָאַ֑יִן <S%H369><s%> va-'A-yin; there וְ֝לַמְנַחֲמִ֗ים <S%H5162><s%> ve-lam-na-cha-Mim, but [there was] none and for comforters וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo none מָצָֽאתִי׃ <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ti. but I found

וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu They gave בְּבָרוּתִ֣י <S%H1267><s%> be-va-ru-Ti for my meat רֹ֑אשׁ <S%H7219><s%> Rosh; me also gall וְ֝לִצְמָאִ֗י <S%H6772><s%> ve-litz-ma-'I, and in my thirst יַשְׁק֥וּנִי <S%H8248><s%> yash-Ku-ni to drink חֹֽמֶץ׃ <S%H2558><s%> Cho-metz. they gave me vinegar

יְהִֽי־ <S%H1961><s%> ye-hi- become שֻׁלְחָנָ֣ם <S%H7979><s%> shul-cha-Nam Let their table לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H6440><s%> lif-nei-Hem before לְפָ֑ח <S%H6341><s%> le-Fach; become a snare וְלִשְׁלוֹמִ֥ים <S%H7965><s%> ve-lish-lo-Mim them and [that which should have been] for [their] welfare לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <S%H4170><s%> le-mo-Kesh. [let it become] a trap

תֶּחְשַׁ֣כְנָה <S%H2821><s%> tech-Shach-nah be darkened עֵ֭ינֵיהֶם <S%H5869><s%> 'Ei-nei-hem Let their eyes מֵרְא֑וֹת <S%H7200><s%> me-re-'ot; that they see וּ֝מָתְנֵ֗יהֶם <S%H4975><s%> u-ma-te-Nei-hem, not and make their loins תָּמִ֥יד <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid continually הַמְעַֽד׃ <S%H4571><s%> ham-'Ad. to shake

שְׁפָךְ־ <S%H8210><s%> she-foch- Pour out עֲלֵיהֶ֥ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem out זַעְמֶ֑ךָ <S%H2195><s%> za'-Me-cha; thine indignation וַחֲר֥וֹן <S%H2740><s%> va-cha-Ron upon them and let thy wrathful אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <S%H639><s%> 'ap-pe-cha, anger יַשִּׂיגֵֽם׃ <S%H5381><s%> yas-si-Gem. take hold

תְּהִי־ <S%H1961><s%> te-hi- become טִֽירָתָ֥ם <S%H2918><s%> ti-ra-Tam Let their habitation נְשַׁמָּ֑ה <S%H8074><s%> ne-sham-Mah; be desolate בְּ֝אָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H168><s%> be-'o-ho-lei-Hem, in their tents אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- may none יְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> ye-Hi become יֹשֵֽׁב׃ <S%H3427><s%> yo-Shev. [and] let none dwell

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah Yourself אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- whom הִכִּ֣יתָ <S%H5221><s%> hik-Ki-ta [him] whom thou hast smitten רָדָ֑פוּ <S%H7291><s%> ra-Da-fu; For they persecute וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- of מַכְא֖וֹב <S%H4341><s%> mach-'ov to the grief חֲלָלֶ֣יךָ <S%H2491><s%> cha-la-Lei-cha of those whom thou hast wounded יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H5608><s%> ye-sap-Pe-ru. and they talk

תְּֽנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> te-nah- Add עָ֭וֹן <S%H5771><s%> 'A-von iniquity עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto עֲוֹנָ֑ם <S%H5771><s%> 'a-vo-Nam; unto their iniquity וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> ve-'al- not יָ֝בֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u, and let them not come בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H6666><s%> be-tzid-ka-Te-cha. into thy righteousness

יִ֭מָּחֽוּ <S%H4229><s%> Yim-ma-chu Let them be blotted מִסֵּ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> mis-Se-fer out of the book חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> chai-Yim; of the living וְעִ֥ם <S%H5973><s%> ve-'Im with צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים <S%H6662><s%> tzad-di-Kim, with the righteous אַל־ <S%H408><s%> 'al- not יִכָּתֵֽבוּ׃ <S%H3789><s%> yik-ka-Te-vu. and not be written

וַ֭אֲנִי <S%H589><s%> Va-'a-ni I עָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> 'a-Ni But I [am] poor וְכוֹאֵ֑ב <S%H3510><s%> ve-cho-'Ev; and sorrowful יְשׁוּעָתְךָ֖ <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-te-Cha let thy salvation אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him O God תְּשַׂגְּבֵֽנִי׃ <S%H7682><s%> te-sag-ge-Ve-ni. set me up on high
